response.overview: Gustav Mahler - Symphonies 1-10 - RCO Live (2009-2011) The videos in this set of live HD recordings by the Royal Concertgebouw Orchestra were filmed during the 2009-2011 Mahler Celebration at the Concertgebouw in Amsterdam. The set's eleven discs include performances by renowned conductors such as Daniele Gatti, Bernard Haitink, Pierre Boulez and Iv+fn Fischer. In addition to all ten of Mahler's groundbreaking symphonies, the collection also includes Totenfeier and Das Lied von der Erde and features world-class soloists such as soprano Miah Persson, mezzo Bernarda Fink and tenor Robert Dean Smith. All of this amazing music is brought vividly to life in surround sound and lifelike high-definition video.
response.title: Gustav Mahler - Symphonies 1-10 - RCO Live (2009-2011)
